reviewText: I was very happy with the purchase. It's nice to be able to buy an older movie in such good shape and at such a good price!
I bought this because of Captain Corelli's Mandolin. I loved the soundtrack and the whole story. The scenery was beautiful. I haven't watched  meet Joe Black yet but the combo was a good price.
This two set dvd contains one of my all time favorite movies, Meet Joe Black. The message of this story is timeless like it's predecessor, Death Takes a Holiday.
the DVD works only on one of my DVD players even both are good. In addition, the Captain Corelli's Mandolin in onlty partial viewable.
She screamed, we watched Joe Black together the first night..she is saving Nicholas Cage for another girls night, he is one of her favorite actors.

great movies

It was nice to get two movies in one package and the price was certainly right.  Not blueray but that was ok
Received in timely manner.  Perfect condition - brand new in wrapping.  No issues whatsoever - - and I loved the movies!

I wanted both of these movies but was trying to decide which one because I LOVE a bargain, when I found both of these for around $12 & change. I had to snap it up & combined it with an addtional order of things I needed so I didn't pay shipping which I never pay unless it's aboslutely necessary & even then it must be economical.

Captain Corelli's mandolin is very sweet, and exciting because it's set in the middle of a war. But at the same time the way Cage and Cruz fall in love  ironic, and heartbreakingly sad. Meet Joe Black is funny,intriguing, and so very romantic. It has a great plot, with a palpable chemistry between Brad Pitt and Claire Forlani, there love is so amazing it makes you want to cry.
Two of my favorite films in one!
two movies for the price of one. how do you go wrong with this. watched the old movie "Death takes a Holiday" with friends. Bought this to show the comparison for "Meet Joe Black".
Enjoyed both movies.  Great acting job by Brad Pitt.  Cute love story in Captain Corelli's Mandolin.
My sister loved both of these movies, and I loved the double feature price ;)
Excellent.
I mostly bought it for the movie Captain Coreli's Mandolin I love that movie.  Meet Joe Blk was a bonus.  I am sure I will like that too.
I enjoyed the movie Meet Joe Black a lot. Interesting concept, also Brad Pitt plays his part well I thought.
Both are great stories
Love them both.  Only buy dvd's I want to watch more than once.  xo
I would give 5 stars I love Joe Black, just wish did not have to buy Nick Cage movie to get a good buy.
Perfect
2 good movies for one price...
I love these movies. Thanks so much.
Great movie
the movie arrived timely and is good. the service was more than satisfactory  thank you
This movie is a visual stunner.  It really looks wonderful on a bigger screen.  ... oh and of course, there's Brad and Anthony....

Familiar theme (dates back to Greek mythology): deity usually dealing out death tempted to sample earthly pleasures -- in this case before ringing down the vfinal curtain.  Extremely well acted (great cast) and brilliantly produced.  Pure and thoughtful entertainment!

Both movies are a joy and to get them together for less than $5 - WOW. Now, these are a bit off-beat in how they are told, but the characters are so very interesting and enjoyable to watch and luxuriate in how they explore each other and communicate.

Meet Joe Black is fiction, but I love the way the movie brings out things in this man's life that he took for granted before. It is an" on the edge of your seat movie," but also gets the message across. Great movie!
The plastic cover on the DVD was cut/slashed open so it was a little embarrassing to gift it, but the movies worked fine. Great price.

Corellis Mandolin..wow, such a deep impression, do we ever think of places like Greece that got invaded and how the people had to cope?  Pretty intense for me, but with light hearted moments. A keeper.

This double DVD had the complete movies PLUS the Capt. Corelli's Mandolin director's cut, a very nice bonus, explaining the condition of the island before they arrived to film and all the construction necessary to complete the movie.
